"""
The setup is getting better - our drill is now working, but we need to:
1. Add fuel to furnaces
2. Add initial iron ore to furnaces
3. Make sure inserters are properly positioned and rotated
"""

# First fuel the furnaces
furnaces = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})
for furnace in furnaces:
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=10)
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Add initial ore

# Let's reposition everything more compactly
drill = get_entities({Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill})[0]
chest = get_entities({Prototype.IronChest})[0]

# Pick up and reposition furnaces closer to chest
for furnace in furnaces:
    pickup_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, furnace.position)

# Place furnaces in line with chest
furnace1 = place_entity_next_to(
    Prototype.StoneFurnace,
    reference_position=chest.position,
    direction=Direction.RIGHT,
    spacing=2
)
furnace2 = place_entity_next_to(
    Prototype.StoneFurnace,
    reference_position=furnace1.position,
    direction=Direction.RIGHT,
    spacing=2
)

# Add fuel and ore to new furnaces
for furnace in [furnace1, furnace2]:
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=10)
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)

# Reposition inserters
inserters = get_entities({Prototype.BurnerInserter})
for inserter in inserters:
    pickup_entity(Prototype.BurnerInserter, inserter.position)

# Place inserter from drill to chest
inserter1 = place_entity_next_to(
    Prototype.BurnerInserter,
    reference_position=drill.position,
    direction=Direction.RIGHT,
    spacing=1
)
rotate_entity(inserter1, Direction.RIGHT)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter1, quantity=5)

# Place inserters from chest to furnaces
inserter2 = place_entity_next_to(
    Prototype.BurnerInserter,
    reference_position=chest.position,
    direction=Direction.RIGHT,
    spacing=1
)
rotate_entity(inserter2, Direction.RIGHT)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter2, quantity=5)

# Verify final setup
print("\nFinal automation setup:")
print(f"Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entity statuses:")
for entity in get_entities():
    print(f"{entity.name} at {entity.position}: {entity.status}")
